## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                       | Description                                  |
| ------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------- |
| `--rating--container-display`              | Display of the rating container              |
| `--rating--emoji-after-content`            | Content of the rating emoji after            |
| `--rating--emoji-selected-1-after-content` | Content of the rating star selected 1 after  |
| `--rating--emoji-selected-2-after-content` | Content of the rating star selected 2 after  |
| `--rating--emoji-selected-3-after-content` | Content of the rating star selected 3 after  |
| `--rating--emoji-selected-4-after-content` | Content of the rating star selected 4 after  |
| `--rating--emoji-selected-5-after-content` | Content of the rating star selected 5 after  |
| `--rating--star-after-content`             | Content of the rating star after             |
| `--rating--star-emoji-cursor`              | Cursor of the rating star rating emoji       |
| `--rating--star-emoji-display`             | Display of the rating star rating emoji      |
| `--rating--star-emoji-font-size`           | Font size of the rating star rating emoji    |
| `--rating--star-emoji-margin-right`        | Margin right of the rating star rating emoji |
| `--rating--star-emoji-transition`          | Transition of the rating star staring emoji  |
| `--rating--star-selected-after-content`    | Content of the rating star selected after    |
| `--rating--star-selected-color`            | Color of the rating star selected            |
